mapper.insert: INSERT INTO nc_user( user_id, user_name, nick_name, mobile_phone, user_icon_url, email, sex, birthday, create_time ) VALUES ( #{userId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobilePhone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userIconUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{birthday, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM nc_user WHERE user_id = #{userId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT a.user_id userId, a.user_name userName, a.nick_name nickName, a.mobile_phone mobilePhone, a.user_icon_url userIconUrl, a.email email, a.sex sex, DATE_FORMAT(a.birthday, '%Y-%m-%d') birthday, a.status status, a.authorized authorized, a.auth_idcard authIdcard, a.auth_real_name authRealName, a.login_times loginTimes, DATE_FORMAT(a.last_login_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') lastLoginTime, a.follows follows, a.followers followers, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') createTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.update_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') updateTime FROM nc_user a WHERE a.user_id = #{userId, jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT a.user_id userId, a.user_name userName, a.nick_name nickName, a.mobile_phone mobilePhone, a.user_icon_url userIconUrl, a.email email, a.sex sex, DATE_FORMAT(a.birthday, '%Y-%m-%d') birthday, a.status status, a.authorized authorized, a.auth_idcard authIdcard, a.auth_real_name authRealName, a.login_times loginTimes, DATE_FORMAT(a.last_login_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') lastLoginTime, a.follows follows, a.followers followers, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') createTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.update_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') updateTime FROM nc_user a WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY a.user_id ASC
